start.text: Good, bad, I'm the one with the gun.
Time to start piling up the bodies!
I'll have a BLT, that's a lettuce, tomato, and blood sandwich. Hold the mayo, huh? HA HA HA!

start_boss.text: I'm your best reason to be afraid.

retreat.text: What in the hell? What is this, some kind of freaky time warp acid trip?

engaged.text: How do you like your flesh cooked?
They're gonna need a bucket and a mop when I'm done with you!
I am death, who want some?

pursuing.text: When you get to hell, tell them I sent you. You will get a group discount.

running.text: But I like my hands bloody.

hull_90.text: Now now, no need to get worked up!
I'm gonna have to put you down!

hull_30.text: They're gonna need a bucket and a mop when I'm done with you!
Well that's ONE way to open somebody up, but not nearly as quick or fun as my method!

death.text: Looks like my train's come in.
I never said I was smart.

victory.text: Now, where did all those gun-toting madmen get to...
